entry.title: RT 🐘🔗 sam.arweave.dev: Recently, a helpful community website -- Fortunately, there was a copy on the permaweb. Now it has a permanent Arweave na...
entry.summary: RT 🐘🔗 sam.arweave.dev Recently, a helpful community website -- Fortunately, there was a copy on the permaweb. Now it has a permanent Arweave name: Permaweb apps don't fail you when you need them. ArNS > DNS. siegfried.arweave.dev 🐘 🎈 🧬: @samecwilliams @benjileibo The Arweave Fees calculator now has a short and easy to remember ArNS address: H/T to the builder of the permapage, who is not me and whom I do not know. http://ar-fees.arweave.dev
